Components Overview

FEFramework provides 10 core components, all built with Bootstrap 5, fully accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA), and support for multi-brand theming.

Component Listâ€‹

Form Componentsâ€‹

Buttonâ€‹

Interactive button with multiple variants, sizes, and loading states. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

FormInputâ€‹

Text input field with label, validation, and error messaging. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

FormSelectâ€‹

Dropdown select with label, validation, and keyboard navigation. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

Feedback Componentsâ€‹

Alertâ€‹

Notification banner with 8 variants and dismissible functionality. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

Modalâ€‹

Dialog overlay with focus trap and backdrop. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

Content Componentsâ€‹

Cardâ€‹

Flexible content card with image, header, body, and footer. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

Heroâ€‹

Full-width hero section with background image and CTA buttons. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

Carouselâ€‹

Image carousel with Swiper integration and full accessibility. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

Navigation Componentsâ€‹

Navbarâ€‹

Responsive navigation header with mobile toggle. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

Footerâ€‹

Multi-column footer with links, copyright, and social media. Energia PowerNI WCAG AA

Common Featuresâ€‹

All FEFramework components share these features:

ðŸŽ¨ Multi-Brand Supportâ€‹

Every component accepts a brand prop:

<Button brand="energia">Energia Button</Button>
<Button brand="powerni">PowerNI Button</Button>

â™¿ Accessibilityâ€‹

  • WCAG 2.1 AA compliant
  • Full keyboard navigation
  • Screen reader support
  • Focus management
  • ARIA attributes
  • Color contrast verified

ðŸ“˜ TypeScriptâ€‹

Fully typed with TypeScript for better developer experience:

import type { ButtonProps, ButtonVariant } from '@feframework/ui';

ðŸŽ¯ Bootstrap Integrationâ€‹

Built on Bootstrap 5 utility classes:

<Button className="mt-3 px-4">Custom Spacing</Button>

ðŸ§ª Testedâ€‹

  • 80%+ code coverage
  • Unit tests with Vitest
  • Accessibility tests with jest-axe
  • Visual regression tests in Storybook

Usage Patternsâ€‹

Basic Importâ€‹

import { Button, Card, Alert } from '@feframework/ui';

With Typesâ€‹

import { Button } from '@feframework/ui';
import type { ButtonProps } from '@feframework/ui';

const CustomButton = (props: ButtonProps) => {
  return <Button {...props} />;
};

Brand-Specificâ€‹

import { Button } from '@feframework/ui';

function EnergiaButton() {
  return <Button brand="energia" variant="primary">Click Me</Button>;
}

function PowerNIButton() {
  return <Button brand="powerni" variant="primary">Click Me</Button>;
}

Storybookâ€‹

Explore all components interactively in Storybook with:

  • Live component previews
  • Interactive prop controls
  • Brand switcher
  • Accessibility checks
  • Code examples

Next Stepsâ€‹

  • Browse individual component documentation
  • Check out theming guide
  • Learn about accessibility features
  • View Kentico integration
